```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, 
  eval = TRUE,
  cache = FALSE,
  fig.width = 150 / 25.4,
  fig.height = 100 / 25.4,
  warning = TRUE,
  error = TRUE,
  message = TRUE
)
library(lipsum) # remotes::install_github("inbo/lipsum")
library(DT)
library(ggplot2)
library(INBOtheme) # remotes::install_github("inbo/INBOtheme")
if (interactive()) {
  theme_set(
    theme_vlaanderen2015(
      base_family = "FlandersArtSans-Regular",
      base_size = 10
    )
  )
} else {
  switch(
    opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to"),
    html = {
      opts_chunk$set(dev = "png", dpi = 72)
      theme_set(
        theme_vlaanderen2015(
          base_family = "FlandersArtSans-Regular", 
          base_size = 12
        )
      )
    },
    latex = {
      opts_chunk$set(dev = "cairo_pdf", dpi = 300)
      theme_set(
        theme_vlaanderen2015(
          base_family = "FlandersArtSans-Regular", 
          base_size = 9
        )
      )
      update_geom_defaults("point", list(size = 1.5))
    },
    epub3 = {
      opts_chunk$set(dev = "png", dpi = 300)
      theme_set(
        theme_vlaanderen2015(
          base_family = "FlandersArtSans-Regular", 
          base_size = 12
        )
      )
    }
  )
}
switchColour(vl.darkyellow)
set.seed(201901017)
```
